attributes.action: Stop the Dudley Council from removing the swimming baths in Coseley, West Midlands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to bring to the attention of the prime minister the general neglect of the amenities int the town of Coseley in the West Midlands.

More specifcally it is to highlight the attempt by the local council to close it's swimming pool.
